title: Tsingtao beer logo typeface, similar fonts?
content:
Can anyone ID the typeface used on the TSINGTAO beer logo? (the one used for the name) Or suggest something similar?

Thank you!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [s\_MLA\_v\_V\_f\_145326241\_8209.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100450/http:/typophile.com/files/s_MLA_v_V_f_145326241_8209.jpg) | 12.2 KB |
author: ser

comments.content: Most probably custom to me, meaning not a font. [Quorum](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014100450/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/quorum/) is in the same vein.
